entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Behavior<Layout<View>> causes InvalidOperationException: "bindable not an instance of AssociatedType" #21376
  • Android TalkBack screen reader doesn't tell the user which item is selected in a .NET MAUI CollectionView #21375
  • Error when adding to ObservableCollection #21374
    .NET 8 SR4
  • New Property "MaximumFontSize" #21370
  • [Android] image AspectFill is not honored #21368
  • iOS Publishing uses project name and ignores bundle identifier #21365
  • VS2022 (v 17.9.3) will not hit breakpoints in a Task #21364
  • [net9.0] Control iOS device tests don't finish #21362
    .NET 9 Planning
  • SecureStorage.Default.GetAsync not able to retrieve value set on another page. #21361
  • Windows/UWP crashes on 8.0.10 #21360
  • [iOS] CollectionView with GroupHeader/GroupFooter crashes #21359
  • Xamarin Forms Android WebView Background Image works. MAUI Android WebView Background Image doesn't work #21355
  • MAUI Community Toolkit EventToCommandBehavior Fails to Pass EventArgs Arguments in Versions > 1.0 #21354
  • Request for disambiguation of NativeReference and ObjCBindingLibrary #21352

Closed

  • Windows app installs on Wndows 10 but fails to install on Windows 11 as it keeps asking for .NET even after installation of .NET 8? #20084
  • Label doesn't render correctly when in a Grid with column definitions #10494
    .NET 8 SR4
  • WebView in MAUI project doesn't scroll when has a PDF file loaded #21346
  • [regression/7.0.100] MAUI SR9 7.0.100 breaks iOS build #18573
  • [WinUI 3] Windows App Title Bar Buttons Have Button Shadows in .NET8 after project upgrade from .NET7 #18773
  • The text of the buttons of an Alert is not displayed correctly in windows. #18759
  • How i can create v2ray VPN connection in MAUI? for Android, Windows and IOS? #21348
  • QueryParameter does not passd into ViewModel when BindingContext is defined inside xaml by RelativeSource binding on page. #9549
  • Custom BindableRadioGroup is not working #17445
  • VisualStates are not being applied to items in a CollectionView using DataTemplates in Release Mode #9756
  • Viewcell tap gesture not working with datatemplate selector in MAUI 8.0 #20857
  • [MacCatalyst] FilePicker focuses on wrong window after selecting file #17447
  • Can't find debug target or "{}" #21182
  • Integrated Hello World Maui startup project crashes after splashscreen on iOS 16.5.1 and .NET8.0 in release mode. #19522

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Update versions #21373
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [macOS] Make window overlay to redraw correctly during window resizing #21371
    community ✨
  • [X] Fix PropertyChanged on idx for compiledbindings #21366
  • Update Styles.xaml on Multi Project #21363
  • [macOS] Fix crash when setting window properties #21357
    community ✨
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/templates 📄
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, control-editor

Merged

  • Rework foreground color and remove outdated methods #21238
  • [ci] Fix APIScan #21358
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker
  • [X] GetValueSource #19563
    area/testing, .NET 8 SR4
  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Update BlazorWebView Device Tests to have longer timesouts and more retries #21318
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back #20727
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, stale, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Android] Fixed box view properties #21322
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #21304
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix gestures not working on Button #20988
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button, area/gestures
  • [X] Improve warnings when binding cannot be compiled #21281
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • [UI Testing] Split mouse and touch Appium actions and added pending ones (TouchAndHold etc) #21305
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Ported legacy tests to Appium #21175
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [CI] Clean all yaml in the pipelines of warnings and errors and add a workflow to validate the yaml used. #21345
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker
  • [Android] Span line height fix #20352
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [iOS] Fixed RadioButton text related properties not working #20366
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-editor
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-refreshview
  • [Android] Fixed border inside frame not rendering #20974
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-border
  • [Android] Border with RoundRectangle - fix #21250
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-border
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • Call RootViewChanged when setting ContentView to null #20052
    area/shell 🐢
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
